reqs: In 2017W, the topic for HIST 420A, section 201 is Gender and Sexuality in Canada. Examines the changing meanings, lived experiences and central roles of gender and sexuality in the history of northern North America, with a focus on the past 150 years.
courseName: Topics in Canadian History - TPCS CAN HISTORY
description: May include immigration, French-English relations, the growth of the state, health and welfare, or the family.
